# simple-button

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description              | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | Text shown inside button | `string` | `undefined` |

## Events

| Event         | Description                          | Type               |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------------ |
| `changeClick` | Event emitted when clicked on button | `CustomEvent<any>` |
